items.name: Luna Classic Aviator Sunglasses
items.description: So made for sunny days, these effortlessly cool sunglasses are featured in a classic square-shaped frame and aviator-inspired style with a delicate brow bar, eye-catching tinted lenses, and adjustable nose pads.

items.name: Avalon Oval Sunnies
items.description: Add a fun and funky touch to any look with these so cool sunnies featured in a defined oval style with thick frames and super defined sides for added shape and dimension.

items.name: Dylan Aviator Sunnies
items.description: Adding a cool and contemporary touch to a timeless classic, these stunning sunnies are featured in a staple aviator silhouette with ombre-style lenses, defined nose bridge, and exaggerated metal prongs for an added special touch.

items.name: Heart Eyes Sunglasses
items.description: Be so heart eyes with these super sweet, playful sunnies.

items.name: INDY Nolita Polarized Sunglasses
items.description: The perfect luxe pair, these eye-catching glasses are featured in a cat eye silhouette and durable acetate frame with polarized lenses and branded detailing.

items.name: Alden Polarized Sunglasses
items.description: Be bold in these square-framed sunnies featuring a tortoise pattern frame and polarized lenses for extra sun protection.

items.name: Jenny Rimless Sunglasses
items.description: Less is more: these rimless sunnies feature bare round frames with chunky tort temples for a show-stopping touch.

items.name: Bayview Wide Shield Sunglasses
items.description: Exude effortless edge with these tinted shield sunnies.

items.name: Black Diamond Polarized Sunglasses
items.description: Dazzle in these so-classic, embellished polarized sunnies.

items.name: Roger Aviator Sunglasses
items.description: Majorly retro, these so cool sunnies are featured in a vintage-inspired aviator design for an effortlessly chic addition to any look.

items.name: Aces Aviator Sunglasses
items.description: Sure to be a staple in your accessories collection for many years to come, these so cool sunglasses are featured in an updated aviator design with uniquely shaped frames and super thin metal detailing for a sleek style.

items.name: Jenny Rimless Sunglasses
items.description: Less is more: these rimless sunnies feature bare round frames with chunky tort temples for a show-stopping touch.

items.name: Bowery Slouchy Lieutenant Hat
items.description: This vintage-inspired lieutenant cap is the perfect go-with-everything accessory.

items.name: Movement Logo Baseball Cap
items.description: Cap off your workout look with this so sporty baseball hat from FP Movement featuring an embroidered buti on the front.

items.name: Cowboy Baseball Hat
items.description: Sarcasm rules with this cute foam trucker hat from Sendero Provisions, featuring a 5 panel construction and curved brim, donning the words Cowboy Hat so you can participate in the trend without straying too far from your style..

items.name: Soft Turn Felt Cowboy Hat
items.description: Stylish black cowboy hat

items.name: Full Moon Nubby Pom Beanie
items.description: Add the ideal touch of texture to your cold weather collection with this timeless beanie featured in a classic knit fabrication with defined ribbed bottom hem and exaggerated faux fur pom pom at top for an added special touch.

items.name: Yippee Ki Yay Baseball Hat
items.description: Take your hootin’ and hollerin’ to your hat: this cheeky slog-adorned cap from Sendero Provisions is all you need to make a true Western statement.

items.name: Brixton Fiddler Marine Cap
items.description: A totally timeless style, this charming cap from Brixton is featured in a classic lieutenant design for the perfect dose of vintage-inspired style.

items.name: Woven Cove Sun Hat
items.description: Sure to be a go-to for all of your sun adventures, this stunning hat is featured in the perfect woven fabrication and dome-down style for added shape.

items.name: Lake Washed Bucket Hat
items.description: Perfect for outdoor adventures, this so classic bucket hat features a wide, floppy brim in a washed design and straps that tie under the chin.

items.name: Big Buti Beanie
items.description: Chunky ribbed knit beanie with a wide cuff and oversized embroidered logo detailing.

items.name: Snow Angel Faux Fur Beanie
items.description: Warm up any look with this luxe hat featured in a stunning faux fur fabrication.

items.name: Loopy Mango Tweed Edelweiss Pom Beanie
items.description: Add a special touch to your winter wardrobe with this stylish beanie featured in a chunky knit design with cuffed bottom hem, patch logo at front, and fun pom detail at top for a little something extra.

items.name: Petite Bow
items.description: Put the finishing touch on your tresses with this feminine accessory that features a dainty satin bow with an easy clip closure for all-day wear.

items.name: Mini Fine Hair Claw
items.description: So sweet and petite, this mini claw clip is the perfect added detail to any do.

items.name: Rosemary's Rose Set Of 6 Clips
items.description: Add a romantic touch to your tresses with these mini rosette clips.

items.name: Smitten Faux Fur Earmuffs
items.description: Cozy yet chic, these soft earmuffs are featured in a fuzzy faux fur fabrication perfect for keeping your ears warm in the winter.

items.name: That Simple Velvet Hard Headband
items.description: You will look instantly put together when you wear this twisted velvet hard headband..

items.name: Show Stopper Bow Hard Headband
items.description: Shine on with this delicate, rhinestone-adorned headband, featuring bow and pearl accents for a sweet, femme touch.

items.name: Chimmi Chantilly Hair Pin
items.description: Twist your hair up and away with this sweet U-shaped hair pin.

items.name: Embellished Metal Etched Barrettes
items.description: Add a special touch to your daily hair-do with these stunning barrettes featured in a staple silhouette and jewel-adorned design.

items.name: Pearl Maisie Headband
items.description: So perfect in pearl, this feminine headband is featured in a thin style and stretchy fit with stunning glass pearl embellishments, crystal flower beads, and woven silk ribbon.

items.name: Ariana Ost Dripping Stones Hair Tie
items.description: A unique way to elevate your updo, this so stunning hair tie features dangling stone pendants from a delicate chain and wire-wrapped elastic for effortlessly eye-catching adornment.

items.name: Dolly's Jumbo Scrunchie
items.description: Make a dainty statement with this jumbo, semi-sheer scrunchie.

items.name: Pias Bow Headband
items.description: Its bows galore with this thin hard headband.
